events.name: onMenuOpenChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the navbar menu open state changes.
events.description_zh: 导航栏菜单打开状态更改时调用的处理程序。

events.name: onScrollPositionChange
events.description: Handler that is called when the navbar parent element is scrolled. This event is only dispatched if `disableScrollHandler` is set to false or `shouldHideOnScroll` is set to true.
events.description_zh: 滚动导航栏父元素时调用的处理程序。仅当“disableScrollHandler”设置为“false”或“shouldHideOnScroll”设置为“true”时，才会调度此事件。

:children.description: The children to render. Usually navbar elements such as `NavbarBrand`, `NavbarContent` and `NavbarItem`
:children.description_zh: 要呈现的子项。通常是导航栏元素，例如“NavbarBrand”、“NavbarContent”和“NavbarItem”

maxWidth.description: The max width of the navbar wrapper.
maxWidth.description_zh: 导航栏包装器的最大宽度。

:parentRef.description: The parent element where the navbar is placed within. This is used to determine the scroll position and whether the navbar should be hidden or not.
:parentRef.description_zh: 放置导航栏的父元素。这用于确定滚动位置以及导航栏是否应隐藏。

isBordered.description: Whether the navbar should have a bottom border or not.
isBordered.description_zh: 导航栏是否应该有底部边框。

isBlurred.description: Whether the navbar should have a blur effect or not.
isBlurred.description_zh: 导航栏是否应该具有模糊效果。

isMenuOpen.description: Indicates if the navbar menu is open. (controlled)
isMenuOpen.description_zh: 指示导航栏菜单是否打开。（受控）

isMenuDefaultOpen.description: Indicates if the navbar menu is open by default. (uncontrolled)
isMenuDefaultOpen.description_zh: 指示导航栏菜单是否默认处于打开状态。（不受控制）

shouldHideOnScroll.description: Indicates if the navbar should hide on scroll.
shouldHideOnScroll.description_zh: 指示导航栏是否应在滚动时隐藏。

:motionProps.description: The motion props to controle the `visible` / `hidden` animation. This motion is only available if the `shouldHideOnScroll` prop is set to true.
:motionProps.description_zh: 用于控制“可见”/“隐藏”动画的运动道具。仅当“shouldHideOnScroll”道具设置为“true”时，此动作才可用。

disableScrollHandler.description: Whether the navbar parent scroll event should be listened to or not.
disableScrollHandler.description_zh: 是否应侦听导航栏父滚动事件。

disableAnimation.description: Whether the navbar menu animation should be disabled or not.
disableAnimation.description_zh: 是否应禁用导航栏菜单动画。

classNames.description: Allows to set custom class names for the navbar slots.
classNames.description_zh: 允许为导航栏插槽设置自定义类名。

slots.name: base
slots.description: The main slot for the navbar. It takes the full width of the parent and wraps the navbar elements including the menu.
slots.description_zh: 导航栏的主插槽。它采用父项的整个宽度，并包装包括菜单在内的导航栏元素。

slots.name: wrapper
slots.description: The slot that contains the navbar elements such as brand, content and toggle.
slots.description_zh: 包含导航栏元素（如品牌、内容和切换）的槽。

slots.name: brand
slots.description: The slot for the NavbarBrand component.

slots.name: content
slots.description: The slot for the NavbarContent component.

slots.name: item
slots.description: The slot for the NavbarItem component.

slots.name: toggle
slots.description: The slot for the NavbarMenuToggle component.

slots.name: toggleIcon
slots.description: The slot for the NavbarMenuToggle icon.

slots.name: menu
slots.description: The slot for the NavbarMenu component.

slots.name: menuItem
slots.description: The slot for the NavbarMenuItem component.
